title: Full Transcript of President Bidenâ€™s Speech on Democracy
description: The president warned of escalating threats of political violence after the assault of the husband of Speaker Nancy Pelosi. Mr. Biden asked Americans to vote in the midterms for representatives who would accept the results.

media:content.media:credit: Pete Marovich for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: President Biden called on Americans to confront threats to democracy.
